name: A Good Life
description:
A Good Life

This wacky adventure game takes you through several game genres. Shoot, evade, fight and jump your way through the games levels, each offering their own unique point of view. Tackled together with a comical narrative, silly characters and interesting levels. This game is sure to make you laugh with  lighthearted jokes and immersion. The game is played with mouse and keyboard utilizing  the ( WASD ) keys, along with the left & right mouse buttons . 

Featuring: 

  • Platforming 
  • dialogue trees
  • Narrative branching
  • Shooting  
  • Fighting
  • Evasion

Made By: Simon Smith, and Avery Taylor
